## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm still trying to wrap my head around how VerusIDs work. What is the benefit of using VerusIDs in terms of security and workflow?

**AI Assistant:**
VerusIDs enable a virtually theft-proof workflow and provide a solution to inheritance, trusts, vesting schedules, the 5$ wrench attack, and identity theft. This is possible because users can revoke and recover an ID, and also create and use fresh private keys when unlocking an ID. It's a game-changer for security and workflow!

**User:**
That sounds incredible. I've also heard that users can create their own tokens or blockchains using Verus. How does that work?

**AI Assistant:**
Any user with a VerusID can create their own token currency or even a full-fledged, multi-currency, ID-issuing blockchain that can send and receive from the Verus chain which launched it. This blockchain can be 50% POW/50% POS and 51% hash attack resistant. It's a powerful tool for users to create their own custom blockchain solutions.

**User:**
That's amazing. I've also heard about Verus PBaaS blockchains. What's the advantage of using those?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus PBaaS blockchains are merge-mineable and stakeable with other blockchains in the Verus network. They also allow projects to join the worldwide Verus community in improving the daemon, which means they start with a complete, multi-currency, ID-capable blockchain with DeFi capabilities. It's a great way for projects to tap into the power of the Verus network.

**User:**
Speaking of DeFi, what's the purpose of DeFi liquidity pools and fractional currency baskets in Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus DeFi protocol allows ID owners to define fractional basket currencies with one or more asset currencies backing the liquidity pool at a fractional percentage. This ensures that all currency conversions using a particular liquidity pool and mined into one block are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing problems of miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running. It also provides fee-based DeFi integrated incentives to miners and stakers, ensuring smooth consensus operation and fee conversion capabilities. It's a powerful tool for creating complex DeFi solutions.
What is the benefit of using VerusIDs in terms of security and workflow?

VerusIDs enable a virtually theft-proof workflow and provide a solution to inheritance, trusts, vesting schedules, the 5$ wrench attack, and identity theft. This is possible because users can revoke and recover an ID, and also create and use fresh private keys when unlocking an ID.

to revoke and recover an ID. Users may also choose to create and use fresh private keys when unlocking an ID as well. This enables virtually theft proof workflow and a solution to inheritance, trusts, vesting schedules, the 5$ wrench attack, and identity theft. IDs may be used as friendly name cryptocurrency addresses for all currencies on all Verus PBaaS blockchains in the Verus network. The VerusID protocol is a protocol, which can also be implemented on non-Verus systems.
## Multi-currency, user created, decentralized tokens and merge-mineable, interoperable blockchains without programming
- Enables any user with an ID to create their own token currency or even full fledged, multi-currency, ID-issuing 50% POW/50% POS, 51% hash attack resistant blockchain that can send and receive from the Verus chain which launched it. All PBaaS chains run from the same daemon, and projects may choose to join the worldwide Verus community in improving the daemon. In doing so, they will start with a complete, multi-currency, ID-capable blockchain with DeFi capabilities that is merge-mineable and stakeable with other blockchains in the Verus network.
## Consensus integrated DeFi liquidity pools and fractional currency baskets
- Any ID owner may define Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies with one or more asset currencies backing the liquidity pool at a fractional percentage ranging from 5% to 100% backing. The Verus DeFi protocol ensures that all currency conversions that use a particular liquidity pool and are mined into one block are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing the problems of miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running, while providing fee-based DeFi integrated incentives to miners and stakers, ensuring smooth consensus operation and fee conversion capabilities by integrating DeFi liquidity pools directly into the consensus and cross-chain bridge protocols.
